TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FragmentNavigationEventHandler(object sender, FragmentNavigationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FragmentNavigationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle events.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This event handler is used for the following events:
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>
- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>
- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>
- <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>
